DOC.brief_summary: This randomize pilot clinical trial study pelvic floor muscle train treat urinary incontinence gynecologic cancer survivor . Pelvic floor muscle training may help control symptom improve physical function quality life gynecologic cancer survivor .
DOC.brief_title: Pelvic Floor Muscle Training Treating Urinary Incontinence Gynecologic Cancer Survivors
DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . To assess whether pelvic floor muscle train behavioral therapy gynecologic cancer survivor result improvement incontinence symptom measure validated questionnaire ( Patient Global Impression Improvement ) three month follow-up compare woman undergo pelvic floor muscle training . II . To evaluate whether woman undergo pelvic floor muscle train behavioral therapy report great improvement validate urinary incontinence symptom severity , pelvic floor distress quality life measure woman undergo pelvic floor muscle training . III . To evaluate acceptability pelvic floor muscle training ( PFMT ) among gynecological cancer survivor provide preliminary data inform power analysis large randomize trial . OUTLINE : Patients randomize 1 2 treatment arm . ARM I : Patients receive handout describe behavioral management tip urinary incontinence , include information suggestion optimal volume fluid intake , constipation management , measure reduce urgency spread fluid intake , avoid caffeine bladder irritant prove effective intervention trial . Patients undergo PFMT 20-30 minute teach contract pelvic floor muscle correctly receive feedback avoid contraction abdominal , gluteal adductor muscle . Patients ask perform 3 set 10 pelvic muscle contraction goal hold contraction 5 second daily 12 week also receive reminder phone call address concern review instruction 4 week . ARM II : Patients receive usual care urinary incontinence , option join train program completion study . After completion study treatment , patient follow 3 month .
DOC.criteria: History uterine , cervical , ovarian vulvar malignancy Treatment free interval > = one year currently evidence cancer Reports urinary incontinence base screen questionnaire Must stable address three month period Current clinical evidence urinary tract infection Within three month fail surgery urinary incontinence Planned surgery urinary incontinence next three month Presence neurologic condition may impact bladder symptom multiple sclerosis , stroke Pregnancy
DOC.keyword: Pelvic floor muscle training ; incontinence ; quality life
